slides.title: Health Care and Insurance
slides.description: In addition to fully implementing the state's health insurance policies, KGS Tech also supports employees with business insurance, accident insurance, and periodic health check-ups.

slides.description: KGS Tech equips sports facilities in offices, organizes professional classes, and diverse sports events for employees to enhance their physical health.
